amendment.description: An amendment, consisting of an amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Cmmittee on International Relations, as modified by two amendments printed in the report accompanying H. Res. 302, and considered as adopted pursuant to H. Res. 302.

action.text: Amendments (A001) by the Committee on International Relations and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 302.
On agreeing to the International Relations amendments (A001) Agreed to without objection.
